long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you want a simple, yet powerful tab-sorting extension for Chrome? SortTabs is exactly what you're looking for!

SortTabsPro is designed to streamline your web browsing experience by offering intuitive and efficient tab management. Whether handling a few tabs or managing a sprawling multi-window session, SortTabs makes it quick and easy.

Key Features:

Sort by Title or Domain: Effortlessly organize your tabs based on their titles or the domain names.
Tab Count Display: Instantly view the total number of open tabs at a glance.
Sorted Tab Listings: After sorting, see a clear list of tabs in their new order for easy navigation.
